00026 #include "httpsession.h"
00027 #include "httpserver.h"
00028 #include <QTcpSocket>
00029 #define DBG_PREFIX "HttpConnection: "
00030 
00031 // some fixes to work with bad code (alias macro preprocessor)
00032 #ifdef major
00033 #undef major
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 #ifdef minor
00037 #undef minor
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 enum State
00041 {
00042     WAITING_FOR_REQUEST_LINE,
00043     WAITING_FOR_HEADERS,
00044     WAITING_FOR_ENTITY_BODY
00045 };
00046 
00047 HttpSession::HttpSession(int socketDescriptor, QObject *parent) :
00048     QThread(parent),
00049     lastSupportedHttpVersion(1, 1),
00050     socket(NULL),
00051     socketDescriptor(socketDescriptor),
00052     state(WAITING_FOR_REQUEST_LINE)
00053 {
00054 }
00055 
00056 HttpSession::~HttpSession()
00057 {
00058     qDebug(DBG_PREFIX "Dying");
00059 }
00060 
00061 void HttpSession::run()
00062 {
00063     socket = new QTcpSocket(this);
00064     connect(socket, SIGNAL(readyRead()), this, SLOT(onReadyRead()));
00065     connect(socket, SIGNAL(disconnected()), socket, SLOT(deleteLater()));
00066     connect(socket, SIGNAL(destroyed()), this, SLOT(quit()));
00067     socket->setSocketDescriptor(socketDescriptor);
00068 
00069     exec();
00070 }
00071 
00072 int HttpSession::isRequestSupported(const HttpRequest &request) const
00073 {
00074     if (request.httpVersion() <= lastSupportedHttpVersion) {
00075         return 0;
00076     } else {
00077         return HttpResponse::HTTP_VERSION_NOT_SUPPORTED;
00078     }
00079 }
00080 
00081 void HttpSession::writeResponse(HttpResponse r)
00082 {
00083     socket->write(r.httpVersion());
00084     socket->write(" ");
00085     socket->write(QByteArray::number(r.statusCode()));
00086     socket->write(" ");
00087     socket->write(r.reasonPhrase());
00088     socket->write("\r\n");
00089 
00090     for (QHash<QByteArray, QByteArray>::const_iterator i = r.headersBeginIterator();i != r.headersEndIterator();++i) {
00091         socket->write(i.key());
00092         if (!i.value().isNull()) {
00093             socket->write(": ");
00094             socket->write(i.value());
00095         } else {
00096             socket->write(":");
00097         }
00098         socket->write("\r\n");
00099     }
00100 
00101     // this should be work of the higher-level stack
00102     if (r.entitySize()) {
00103         socket->write("Content-Length: ");
00104         socket->write(QByteArray::number(r.entitySize()));
00105 
00106         socket->write("\r\n\r\n");
00107 
00108         r.entityBody(socket);
00109     } else {
00110         socket->write("\r\n");
00111     }
00112 
00113     if (r.closeConnection())
00114         socket->close();
00115 }
00116 
00117 void HttpSession::onReadyRead()
00118 {
00119     buffer.append(socket->readAll());
00120 
00121     try {
00122         switch (state) {
00123         case WAITING_FOR_REQUEST_LINE:
00124             {
00125                 while (buffer.startsWith("\r\n"))
00126                     buffer.remove(0, 2);
00127 
00128                 int i = buffer.indexOf("\r\n");
00129                 if (i != -1) {
00130                     QList<QByteArray> request = buffer.left(i).simplified().split(' ');
00131 
00132                     if (request.size() != 3) {
00133                         writeResponse(HttpResponse(lastSupportedHttpVersion, HttpResponse::BAD_REQUEST, true));
00134                         return;
00135                     }
00136 
00137                     requestInfo.setMethod(request.at(0));
00138 
00139                     requestInfo.setUri(request.at(1));
00140 
00141                     {
00142                         HttpVersion version(request.at(2));
00143 
00144                         if (version) {
00145                             requestInfo.setHttpVersion(version);
00146                         } else {
00147                             writeResponse(HttpResponse(lastSupportedHttpVersion, HttpResponse::BAD_REQUEST, true));
00148                             return;
00149                         }
00150                     }
00151 
00152                     {
00153                         int statusCode = isRequestSupported(requestInfo);
00154                         if (statusCode) {
00155                             writeResponse(HttpResponse(lastSupportedHttpVersion, statusCode, true));
00156                             return;
00157                         }
00158                     }
00159 
00160                     buffer.remove(0, request.at(0).size() + request.at(1).size() +
00161                                   request.at(2).size() + 4);
00162 
00163                     state = WAITING_FOR_HEADERS;
00164                 }
00165             }
00166         case WAITING_FOR_HEADERS:
00167             {
00168                 for (int i = buffer.indexOf("\r\n") ; i != -1 ; i = buffer.indexOf("\r\n")) {
00169                     // don't starts with \r\n
00170                     if (i != 0) {
00171                         QByteArray header = buffer.left(i);
00172                         buffer.remove(0, i + 2);
00173 
00174                         i = header.indexOf(':');
00175                         if (i > 0) {
00176                             if (i + 1 < header.size())
00177                                 requestInfo.setHeader(header.left(i).trimmed(), header.mid(i + 1).trimmed());
00178                             else
00179                                 requestInfo.setHeader(header.left(i).trimmed(), QByteArray());
00180                         } else {
00181                             writeResponse(HttpResponse(requestInfo.httpVersion() < lastSupportedHttpVersion ?
00182                                                        requestInfo.httpVersion() : lastSupportedHttpVersion,
00183                                                        HttpResponse::BAD_REQUEST, true));
00184                             return;
00185                         }
00186                     } else {
00187                         buffer.remove(0, 2);
00188 
00189                         if (hasEntityBody(requestInfo)) {
00190                             state = WAITING_FOR_ENTITY_BODY;
00191                         } else {
00192                             state = WAITING_FOR_REQUEST_LINE;
00193                             onRequest(requestInfo);
00194                         }
00195                     }
00196                 }
00197             }
00198         case WAITING_FOR_ENTITY_BODY:
00199             if (atEnd(requestInfo, buffer)) {
00200                 requestInfo.setEntityBody(buffer);
00201                 buffer.clear();
00202                 state = WAITING_FOR_REQUEST_LINE;
00203 
00204                 onRequest(requestInfo);
00205             }
00206         }
00207     } catch (HttpResponse &r) {
00208         r.setCloseConnection(true);
00209         writeResponse(r);
00210     }
00211 }
